name: Overteam New Media
overview:
Overteam, founded in 2005, is an “all-inclusive” publishing company and its main bussiness is producing technology and content.

Overteam’s main bussiness pursuit is producing projects which bring people together. They realize this for companies, universities, NGO’s and themselves.

They have made patlican.com.tr along with Avea to organize the youth. A project realized along with Logo Inc., Diyalogo.com, is the first social community and bussiness project aiming at “Anatolia”. They have made Azbuz.com, a web site having 11 million unique visitors a month, and gayet.net which has lead away to test answering mania in Turkey and sold both of them to Dogan Group. Their most arbitrary project, Buyukkeyif.com, is one of the “strangest” web sites of Turkey as a meeting and content center for rakı drinkers. It is mentioned as the most succesful niche community site all around.
